ILNumerics Ultimate VS - version 4.8
============================

This package installs ILNumerics into your project only. The purpose of this nuget package is to enable nuget distribution in certain multi-server environments. In order to create applications with ILNumerics go to http://ilnumerics.net and download the latest version as a Windows Installer package instead. This will make ILNumerics available systemwide and also enables automatic license management. 

Please note that ILNumerics is not free software! However, you can use it for free for evaluation purpose. To get started, download a trial and a trial license from here:  

http://ilnumerics.net/download.html

The ILNumerics Team
